<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Adds the role need for Issue Auto-Resolution to peform updates on the incident table for ITSM.</description>
        <name>Add sn_incident_write to VA user</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[addRoleToVAUser();

function addRoleToVAUser() {
	var userId = new AutoResolutionContextHelper()._getVAUserID();
	var roleId = '260c203a870033000e56d61e36cb0bbc'; // sn_incident_write
	
	var userRoleGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_has_role');
	userRoleGr.addQuery('user', userId);
	userRoleGr.addQuery('role', roleId);
	userRoleGr.query();
	
	if (!userRoleGr.next()) {
		userRoleGr.newRecord();
		userRoleGr.setValue('user', userId);
		userRoleGr.setValue('role', roleId);
		userRoleGr.insert();
		gs.info('Adding the sn_incident_write role to the Virtual Agent user');
	}
}]]></script>
